sentences.en: (=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
He exhorted his companions, 'Try to accomplish your aim with diligence'.
sentences.cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentences.en: He exhorted his companions, "Try to accomplish your aim with diligence".
sentences.cn: 他劝诫同伴说：“要通过勤奋努力实现自己的目标。”

sentences.en: He is a man who will spoil rather than accomplish things.
sentences.cn: 他这个人成事不足,坏事有余.

sentences.en: He would quench the sunny moment, bring trouble on himself, and accomplish nothing.
sentences.cn: 这会把这个乐融融的时刻破坏, 给自己带来麻烦, 结果一事无成.

sentences.en: If group effort is to be effective, people must know what they are expected to accomplish.
sentences.cn: 如果要想群体的工作更有效率, 必须使人们知道他们所期望达到的是什么.

sentences.en: If we'd all work together, I think we could accomplish our goal.
sentences.cn: 只要大家齐心协力，我想我们就能实现目标。

sentences.en: In order to accomplish this, we must formally record these expectations.
sentences.cn: 为了达到这个目标, 我们必须正式记录这些期望.

sentences.en: It is earnestly hoped that you will accomplish the matter.
Mission accomplished (=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
Mission accomplished(=  we have done what we intended to do  ) .
The fuel rack requires little force to accomplish its motion.
sentences.cn: 油泵齿条几乎毋须费力就能使之移动.

sentences.en: To accomplish his own end, he placed collective interests in the back of his mind.
sentences.cn: 为了达到个人目的, 他把集体利益置之脑后.

sentences.en: To accomplish this result it was only necessary to invent a township.
sentences.cn: 要达到这个目的,所需要的就是创立乡区.

sentences.en: Today I will do what others won't, so tomorrow I can accomplish what others can't.--Jerry Rice
sentences.cn: 今天我做了别人不愿做的事，明天我就能做到别人所不能做的事。

sentences.en: We accomplish this through a process of designating persona types.
sentences.cn: 在这一步骤中,我们指定人物角色类型.

sentences.en: We have accomplished all we set out to do.
sentences.cn: 所有计划要做的事情，我们都已完成。

sentences.en: What a book can do, and what this one will try to accomplish, is to present examples of how life can be made more enjoyable.
sentences.cn: 一本书能做到的，也是本书努力实现的，就是列举一些例子说明如何让生活变得更加愉快。

words.tran_cn: 完成的；熟练的，有技巧的；有修养的；有学问的

trans.tran_en: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard

trans.tran_cn: 达到， 完成， 实现
trans.tran_en: to succeed in doing something, especially after trying very hard
